snippet: As the Hirshhorn Museum and Sculpture Garden approaches its 40th anniversary, there are questions about whether the cancellation of its inflatable pavilion project signals the end of its troubles or is a new dip in a downward slide.
abstract: Hirshhorn Museum and Sculpture Garden faces uncertain future after failure of project to build 15-story inflatable balloon in inner courtyard and resignations of several top officials.
lead_paragraph: As the Hirshhorn Museum and Sculpture Garden approaches its 40th anniversary, there are questions about whether the cancellation of its inflatable pavilion project signals the end of its troubles or is a new dip in a downward slide.

headline.seo: Hirshhorn Museum Drops Plan for an Inflatable Garden Roof
headline.main: Its Bubble Popped, Hirshhorn Takes Stock of the Future
headline.print_headline: Its Bubble Popped, Hirshhorn Takes Stock of the Future
